Appliance makes everything better

Daisy electronics elegance trading l.l.c

About us


Daisy electronics elegance trading l.l.c, is the fastest growing electronics retail & wholesale company in Dubai. Our company was officially launched in 2016 with a clear vision of delivering world-class home appliances from all major global brands to the high-end consumer group of Dubai. We have managed to take authorized distributorship of almost all major home appliances brands around the world including Hitachi, Sharp, Panasonic, Whirlpool, Conon, Philips, V-Guard, Toshiba and many more. We also provide our own finance scheme for our customers to buy these world-class high end products
only Best Electronics can provide you such massive collection of global brands and such massive collection of home appliances products.

Services


Our extended warranty is very simple. We offer our customers added protection to the life of your product. Depending on the plan you purchase you can add additional years of coverage to the standard manufacturers warranty.

• Flexibility to upgrade manufacturers warranty
• No excess on claims
• Simple and prompt claim settlement
• Competitive rates
